sect1.title: Updates
sect1.para: This document is regularly updated. Please visit www.sigb.net to obtain the latest version.

sect1.title: Join
sect1.para: PMB wouldn't exist without everybody day-to-day collaboration. You can help the development of PMB in the following ways :
- translation and localizations (XML file edition with an open source software or a simple text editor; like the notepad of Windows)
- Bug reporting (bugs are quickly handled and corrected)
- Pre-release version rating and testing (available on the PMB website from a few days to 2 weeks before the official release date)
- Supporting messages where you don't forget to tell us : your library size, the kind of book you have, your profession, etc.
